[site]: crossvalidated
[post_id]: 579846
[parent_id]: 
[tags]: 
How to forecast a time series which is generated by accumulating data of every five minutes and reset to 0 by the end of the day

I am working with a time series data which is generated by accumulating data of every five minutes and reset to 0 by the end of the day. This is the scatter plot of the data. It seems to not matching stationary assumption of traditional time series model, like arima or prophet. I used prophet to make a prediction. But the result shows the model performs badly near 0:00(the prediction near 0:00 is much higher than ground truth). Now I am trying to take the first difference of the data and put them to the model. I wonder if there are any better models or solutions to fit this kind of data. Thank you in advance. Here is the data date,y1 2022/6/1 0:00,0.025534482 2022/6/1 0:05,0.046429771 2022/6/1 0:10,0.064790379 2022/6/1 0:15,0.081012709 2022/6/1 0:20,0.095594499 2022/6/1 0:25,0.10867563 2022/6/1 0:30,0.120589211 2022/6/1 0:35,0.131359718 2022/6/1 0:40,0.141249157 2022/6/1 0:45,0.15027672 2022/6/1 0:50,0.158615223 2022/6/1 0:55,0.166271768 2022/6/1 1:00,0.173405206 2022/6/1 1:05,0.179977549
